column1: Senior/Lead Engineer - PV - L3 Protocol Testing
column2: About Tejas Networks Tejas Networks is an R&D-driven organization focused on being at the forefront of technological advancements in the field of telecommunications. With an R&D team comprising of more than 50% of the organization strength, we have continued to invest in the development of new product capabilities. Our products include carrier-grade optical transmission (based on DWDM/PTN/OTN technologies), fiber broadband (based on GPON/NG-PON), broadband wireless (based on LTE 4G/5G) as well as multi-gigabit Ethernet/IP switching and routing products that are fully designed and manufactured in Indiaa true pioneer of Make in India initiative.  Tejas is one of the leading innovators in Indias ICT sector with over 349 patents and a large repository of 280+ semiconductor IPs. Tejas is actively contributing to global 5G standards through its work in Indias telecom standards organization (TSDSI). All this has been done with an energetic & dedicated team of engineers, for whom no problem is unsolvable. What will you do at Tejas? Product Engineering team owns: Platform and software validation for the entire product portfolio Automation Framework Development for the entire product portfolio Product and Technology demos at customer premises across the world Develop and deliver customer documentation and training solutions Compliance with technical certifications like TL9000, TSEC etc. Team works closely with PLM, HW and SW architects, sales and customer account teams to innovate and develop network deployment strategy for a broad spectrum of networking products and software solutions. As part of this team, you will get an opportunity to validate, demonstrate and influence new technologies to shape future optical, routing, fiber broadband and wireless networks. Responsibilities Ensure software features meet identified standards, product marketing/functional requirements and customer solutions Work closely with PLM, engineers from embedded software, network management software and hardware teams to develop manual and automation test strategy  Drive the authoring, execution and automation of feature and solution test plans to validate product capabilities  Build in-depth knowledge of Tejas networking and NMS products  Contribute to a culture of constant innovation and continual improvement  Work with R&D teams as per the project requirements  Support System Engineering team for customer demos, Support field teams on critical customer issues  Active participation in Customer Documentation review Experience / Skill Required 4 to 10 years of experience with BE/B.Tech./M.Tech. (EE/CS) Degree  Interest in progressing a career in Ethernet and IP domains  Ability to build and guide high performance verification teams to achieve stated objectives  Good hands-on experience on  L2 and L3 protocols , especially in the following areas, will be desirable:  IP-MPLS, BGP, OSPF, LDP, RSVP, BFD, L2 VPN, L3 VPN, QoS .  Automation  hands-on experience in open-source frameworks such as Robot, Py-Test, etc. will be a big plus. If the above roles is matching with your skills and you are interested, you can directly reach out at  krishnan@tejasnetworks.com OR nagalakshmis@tejasnetworks.com as well
column11: MPLS, MPLS VPN, Multicast, Automation, QOS, ISIS, L2VPN, LDP, Bgp, L3VPN, RSVP, OSPF

column2: About Tejas Networks Heard of an Indian R&D organization developing optical and data networking products for India and the worldthats Tejas for you. Founded in the year 2000, the only Indian home grown electronic hardware design company, which has to its credit many firsts, namely the first company to successfully demonstrate hitless LCAS on Ethernet hardware, first company to run 100G interface over FPGAs, deployed all over the world and many more. We are #1 in Optical aggregation in India; top-10 globally. Not only design, we have been manufacturing our products in Indiaa true pioneer of Make in India initiative. All this has been done with an energetic & dedicated team of engineers, for whom no problem is unsolvable. Tejas R&D organization is responsible for delivering Access, Edge and Switching products to support Broadband, Mobile Backhaul, Enterprise, Utilities, Fixed Wireless and SDN applications for access, metro and core tiers of the network. What will you do at Tejas? Product Engineering team owns: and software validation for the entire product portfolio Framework Development for the entire product portfolio and Technology demos at customer premises across the world and deliver customer documentation and training solutions with technical certifications like TL9000, TSEC etc. Team works closely with PLM, HW and SW architects, sales and customer account teams to innovate and develop network deployment strategy for a broad spectrum of networking products and software solutions. As part of this team, you will get an opportunity to validate, demonstrate and influence new technologies to shape future optical and data networks. LTE verification team owns the product verification activity of wireless product portfolio based on customer requirement and validating standards. Responsibilities: You will have ownership to develop test cases primarily for Layer1, Layer2, Layer3 features on the controller card and features on the radio card to meet customer requirement. Analyse the use cases/requirements from customer and deployment engineers pertaining to issues/working behaviour of the controller card, chassis as whole, L2, L3 protocols working. Augment tests with feedback from Customer deployments. Analysing, reproduction of the field queries and providing solutions, mainly on L2, L3 protocol working, platform related issues. Functionality, PoC, Performance, Capacity and Soak testing and Log analysis, Raising bugs and getting the issues fixed in co-ordination with development team. Experience / Skill Required: BE/B.Tech./M.Tech. (EC/EE/CS) Degree with 5 to 8 yrs. Hands on experience on VLAN, ACL, DHCP, PTP, ZTP, LAG, DCN, CEM, CFM, ERPS, QOS, IPSEC, OSPF Should have good Debugging and Troubleshooting and log analysis skills. Good understanding of OSI Model, L2, L3/L4 layer, IPv4/IPv6, TCP/UDP Experience with Test Equipment & Tools like Traffic generator Wireshark, Noise emulator, impairment simulators is required. Working experience in Linux server and client environment is expected. Telecom knowledge on NMS/EMS/OSS is desired. Working knowledge of automation using any existing framework, tools, automated test suites by using scripting language like python is a plus. Working knowledge of bug tracking tool, test management tool. If your skills are matching and you are interested, you can also reach out to krishnan@tejasnetworks.com
column11: ERPS, LAG, DHCP, IPSEC, Automation, QOS, L3, Datacom, VLAN, L2/L3 Protocols, OSPF

column2: In this specific role you will be part of the team working to deliver a major project to replace a global Cisco voice platform with Microsoft Teams Enterprise Voice. You will work with the project and local teams to deliver this migration with minimal disruption to the business.      Support the products and services lifecycle, including selection and introduction, growth and maturity, migration, and closure.      Provide input into the design and deliver a Best-of-breed, cloud first, fully integrated voice estate.      Liaise with the various support functions across WPP to define support processes for all products, ensure SLAs are met, and colleague feedback is acted upon.      Deliver the technology scope for projects with telephony or meeting room requirements.      Drive the maximum possible level of automation and instrumentation of the development lifecycle for these products in alignment with SRE principles.      Adhere to quality assurance standards and calculates risks while ensuring excellence in the design and/or delivery of solutions.      Drive customer/partner relationships to anticipate, identify, escalate, and work to resolve technical blockers to accelerate consumption and solution implementations.

column2: We are seeking a proficient networking Engineer with Wireless last mile experience to join our dynamic team. This role requires a deep understanding of network protocols, troubleshooting methodologies, and a passion for staying updated on emerging technologies in the field.                                  ?             Major Responsibilities                     Design, deploy and manage layer2 switching infrastructure to support networking requirement                  Create both high level and detailed design documents, migration plans and methods of procedure for implementation on the network.                  Generate guidelines/procedures for wireless networks and services.                  Generate guidelines for wireless traffic management of Data services                 Work closely with engineering teams to fully understand L0/L1 TCL network design, especially NLD networks, MANs & Access Networks in various cities and provide the needed requirements to ensure efficient L2 network design.                  Provide hardware and capacity requirements, identify shortfall, and trigger capacity upgrade and new hardware requisitions.                  Investigate and analyze emerging network technologies and architectures related to wireless last mile and data services.                  Design service solutions to meet business requirements and strategic directives.                 Creating detailed technical service requirements                 Support the service from inception, through testing, to deployment.                  Providing technical specifications & support for the development of joint services                       *Skill Requirements:                           ?           1. Configure and troubleshoot layer2 switching protocols, including VLANs, Spanning Tree protocol(STP), Rapid Spanning Tree protocol and link Aggregation(LAG)                 2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate wireless solutions into existing network infrastructure.                  3. Have extensive knowledge of IP routing protocols (Static & Dynamic like OSPF and BGP).                 3. Strong knowledge of wireless networking protocols, including 802. 11a/b/g/n/ac/ax and LTE                 6. Experience with network security concepts and protocols, such as WPA2, AES, 802. 1X, and RADIUS.                 4. Hands-on experience developing Layer 2 or 3 based services requirements for network engineering and OSS developers.                 4. Configure and troubleshoot wireless networking equipment, including routers, switches, access points, and controllers.                  6. Monitor network performance and identify areas for optimization and improvement.                  7. Provide technical support and assistance to internal teams and external clients regarding wireless networking issues.                  8. Document network configurations, procedures, and troubleshooting steps.                  9. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in wireless and networking technologies.                 10. Assist in the evaluation and selection of wireless networking hardware and software solutions.                    ?       Other knowledge/skills                     ?           1. Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Electronics & Tele Communication or related field.                 2. Minimum of 3-5 years of experience working as a Wireless Engineer or Network Engineer.                 3. Strong communication and collaboration skills.                 4. Relevant certifications (e. g. CCNA, CCNP, CWNA, CWNP) are a plus.

column2: We are seeking an experienced    Unified Communications Engineer    to join our dynamic team. As an    Unified Communications Engineer   , you will play a crucial role in implementing and maintaining our organization s communication infrastructure. Your expertise in Cisco technologies, Genesys Cloud, and MS Teams Rooms video conferencing solutions will be instrumental in ensuring seamless communication across our enterprise.               ?         Responsibilities               Infrastructure Support   :         Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support the voice and end point environment.         Support of Cisco and other hardware gateways (ISDN, SIP, TCP/IP)         Deploy, troubleshoot, monitor, and optimize IP telephony, voice, video, and mobility solutions.         Assist in software upgrades for existing Cisco voice deployments.         Provide technical assistance to for Corporate Offices and other professionals.               Cisco Call Manager (Cisco Unified Communications Manager)   :         Design, develop, and implement network and telecommunications infrastructure using Cisco Call Manager.         Monitor network connections and installations of Cisco network operating system software.         Configure and maintain network hardware and software.         Support end-users in Cisco VoIP environments (Webex App, Desk Phone, Conference Room)               Genesys Cloud IVR   :         Leverage Genesys Cloud for contact center solutions & Collaborate with business partners, internal clients, and vendors.         Maintain, deploy, and troubleshoot Genesys Cloud-related issues.         Design and implement IVR systems to enhance customer interactions.         Optimize call flows and analyze call detail records.         Understand IVR s role in complex multi-component environments.               Video Conferencing   :         Assist with implementation of Conference Space solutions (MS Teams Room/Webex) & ensure seamless video communication across the organization.         Assist in training and supporting ACI end user base.                 Desired Skills and Qualifications             Bachelor s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related field:         Enterprise-scale VoIP and Video over IP network environments (Cisco, Microsoft)         SIP, DNS, MPLS, ISDN, and existing network and applications.         Deep understanding of IVR s role in complex multi-component environments.         Remote monitoring and management of enterprise IPT environments.         End-user support in MS Teams, Cisco VoIP/CUCM environments.         Microsoft Office suite proficiency.         Technical assistance for ISP outages and related issues.         Certifications   :           Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) or higher.         Genesys certifications (e.g., Genesys Cloud Certified Professional).                 Highly Desired Qualifications             Previous experience in developing card payments software solutions including VISA, MasterCard, Discover, AMEX, JCB, etc.         Business knowledge about card payments industry is a plus.         Work Experience in    Agile    Methodology would be preferable             Education:              BE, BTech Comp Science, BTech Electronics, BE / BTech IT, MSc Comp Sc, MCA

column2: A Network Engineer is responsible for analyzing, designing, installing, configuring, maintaining, and repairing of network infrastructure and application components. A Network Engineer performs a wide variety of evaluation, maintenance, installation, and training tasks to ensure the computer network performance meets company and user satisfaction. A Network Engineer also provides direction, information, and recommendations regarding network configurations and installations.        PRIMARY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES :       Maintain a thorough understanding of the basics behind the Internet and its workings Configure and setup Cisco Firewalls, VPN Concentrators and Security appliances for access to vital business applications      Design, setup and configure complex switching environments      Design, setup and configure complex wireless networking that supports open or secured access and the ability to support voice and video applications.      Maintain a thorough understanding of Local Area Networking.      Configuring and installing client and server network software for upgrading and maintaining network and Managing assigned projects and program components to deliver services in accordance with established      Responding to inquiries from staff, administrators, service providers, site personnel and outside vendors and etc to provide technical assistance and support.      Supervising the administration of systems and servers related network to ensure availability of services to      Troubleshooting malfunctions of network hardware and software applications, telephones, and security      systems to resolve operational issues and restore services.      Any other duties as assigned by management.      Static routing dynamic routing hands-on experience.      Switching technology difference between Layer -2, Layer-3.      Good knowledge of computer networking and desktop.      Devices known cisco, HP, juniper.      Type of Router switches      VTP, STP, Ether channel, inter-vlan routing. IP subnetting /Gateway / DNS /SMTP /POP3      Good knowledge of security product, firewall IPS etc Cisco firewall Palo Alto Fortinet Endpoint security (EDR) Cisco ISE Aruba ClearPass All type of firewall      Difference between type of VPN      Firewall context /routing mode /transparent mode

column1: Senior Cisco Engineer (CCIE written and lab)
column2: Provide on-going administration and support of Cisco Network Infrastructure at Vidillions Datacenter.         Installs, configures and maintains routers, switches, switch-routers, load-balancers, content-delivery devices, firewall/security devices, and other types of networking equipment.         Track circuit, rack, IP, and power data in Vidillions databases and maintain accurate datacenter- specific information.         Demonstrated proficiency with routing protocols and related technologies, RIP, OSPF, EIGRP,BGP.         Troubleshoot networking technologies (including BGP, VLANs, Dot1x, Spanning Tree, Port Channeling, 802.11abgn, etc.).         Use our system resource utilization and monitoring tools to identify potential problem areas before they result in incidents.         Perform the code/image upgrades on the Cisco network devices.         Desired Profile:         5+ years experience hands-on experience with BGP in a production environment         Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering,or related field         CCIE written and lab certification         4-6 years experience configuring and managing routers and switches.         4+ years managing complex network security devices (e.g. firewalls -Cisco, SRX specifically, VPN concentrators). Cisco Routers/firewall/VLANs experience with clearpass highly preferred         Excellent understanding of network applications and protocols (e.g. SSH, DNS, SMTP, etc.).         Advanced knowledge of client-based networking with systems running Windows, Mac OSX, or Linux.         Understanding of end-to-end data flows and traffic patterns (wireshark).         Understanding of voice and video streaming systems and related technologies.         Experience interfacing with Network Monitoring systems and Linux command line.         Good Knowledge of IPV6
